Class ComputerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
      • ComputerPlayer

  • public class ComputerPlayer
extends Player
    Represents a computer opponent for a player to play against in the Labyrinth game.
    Version:
    0.1.24032013
    Author:
    Gareth Gill, John Meikle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComputerPlayer(Board board)
      Generate a computer player opponent using the board settings as information on the computers tile moves.
